title: Interview: Savages
content:
As Savages continue to develop a sterling reputation for their live performances, it wonâ€™t be long until they finally release some recorded material for all of us to marvel over.

In the meanwhile you can listen to an interview I did wit the band prior to their Manchester show, and watch a video of that very same performance.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d0e
